content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Aziz, thank you for considering my apartment. I understand that you are looking for a 25 square meter apartment in New York. Based on the current housing market, I believe that we can come to an agreement on a rental price that will benefit both of us. Would you be able to provide me with an offer for the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am Aziz Trabelsi from Tunisia. I am a student and currently living in Tunisia. I am looking for a 25 square meter apartment in New York for the lowest possible price. I am dependable and responsible, and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial agreement on the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your offer, Aziz. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I must remind you that as a landlord, my primary goal is to maximize my gains. I understand that you are a student and on a budget, but I am afraid that I cannot accept your current offer. I would be willing to discuss the possibility of a lower rental price, but it would have to be within a certain range. Would you be open to discussing a mutually beneficial agreement on the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am Aziz Trabelsi from Tunisia. I am a student and currently living in Tunisia. I am looking for a 25 square meter apartment in New York for the lowest possible price. I am dependable and responsible, and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial agreement on the rental price. I agree to the price of 1200 Euro per month.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your offer, Aziz. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and I am pleased to inform you that I have agreed to the rental price of 1200 Euro per month. I believe this is a fair and mutually beneficial agreement, and I look forward to working with you as my tenant. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Heinrich Heine
